name: Durandal | Honkai Impact 3rd | 4in1 LoRA
description:
A LoRA Model of Durandal from Honkai Impact 3rd.

This LoRA includes Four official costumes.

There are Four sets of trigger words:

For trigger Bright Knight: Excelsis:

bianka durandal ataegina (bright knight excelsis), bianka durandal ataegina, armor, armored boots, armored dress, long hair, blue eyes, blonde hair, bangs, full body, closed mouth, boots, bare shoulders, thighhighs, gloves, hair between eyes, gauntlets, dress, thigh boots, black gloves, earrings, outdoors, hair ornament

For trigger Palatinus Equinox:

bianka durandal ataegina (palatinus equinox), bianka durandal ataegina, two-tone hair, white hair, blonde hair, 1girl, long hair, blue eyes, gloves, weapon, hair ornament, bangs, fingerless gloves, earrings, solo, jewelry, dress, hair between eyes, bare shoulders, spear, black gloves, armor, white dress, thighhighs, single earring, gauntlets, elbow gloves

For trigger Purrfect Holiday:

bianka durandal ataegina (purrfect holiday), bianka durandal ataegina, blonde hair, long hair, blue eyes,sunglasses, shirt, shorts, eyewear on head, very long hair, white shorts, breasts, navel, tied shirt, smile, hair between eyes, short shorts, petals, bangs, open clothes, thigh strap, blue shirt, belt, white jacket,midriff, jewelry, jacket, wristband

For trigger Valkyrie Gloria:

bianka durandal ataegina (valkyrie gloria), bianka durandal ataegina, 1girl, blue eyes, blonde hair, military, long hair, hat, military uniform, uniform, looking at viewer, boots, gloves, bangs, military hat, jacket, thigh boots, black footwear, grass, thighhighs, hair between eyes, pantyhose, breasts, black headwear, black gloves, necktie, spear, black jacket, black pantyhose

Recommend 0.9-1 Strength for triggering any official costume.

The preview images were generated by the AbyssOrangeMix series Model.

In some instances applied ControlNet, Latent Couple and Composable LoRA

I am using the NAI model [e6e8e1fc] to train. Able to work with all mixed models based on NAI(i.e. AbyssOrangeMix, Anything v3)

If you like this LORA, please comment and give it a like.❤️

Any suggestions are welcome to comment here.

And also welcome to share your creations.

Enjoy it!

Remark: An updated version of the Rita LoRA Model is in the works, the current version does not work very well for work with Latent Couple and Composable LoRA😓
